channel.title: smart cards on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in smart cards on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Gemalto Logo
Gemalto was an international digital security company providing software applications, secure personal devices such as smart cards and tokens, and managed services. Formed in June 2006 by the merger of two companies, Axalto and Gemplus International. Gemalto N.V.’s revenue in 2018 was €2.969 billion. Purchased by Thales Group in April 2019 and now operating as Thales DIS, Gemalto was until its acquisition the world’s largest manufacturer of SIM cards. Thales DIS is headquartered in Amsterdam, The Netherlands, and has subsidiaries and group companies in several countries.
You can download theGemaltologo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Gemalto
item.description: Gemalto was an international digital security company providing software applications, secure personal devices such as smart cards and tokens, and managed services. Formed in June 2006 by the merger of two companies, Axalto and Gemplus International. Gemalto N.V.’s revenue in 2018 was €2.969 billion. Purchased by Thales Group in April 2019 and now operating as Thales DIS, Gemalto was until its acquisition the world’s largest manufacturer of SIM cards. Thales DIS is headquartered in Amsterdam, The Netherlands, and has subsidiaries and group companies in several countries.
